alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; South Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 5:09PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Walton County through 500 PM CDT... At 409 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Eglin Air Force Base, or 9 miles south of De Funiak Springs, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eglin Air Force Base, Freeport, Bruce, New Home, Portland and Rock Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
